!-- Form is either argument (whole text), assertion (specific point), evidence or definition !-- Ref is the assertion reference. Use a number to define a group with an assertion, evidences and definitions !-- Type is p (paraphrase), q (direct quotation, no ""s), s (combination of paraphrase and own thoughts) !-- Pg is the page or page range of the note, from the article itself. !-- Cites, notes citation given by author. No ()s needed
